title: Mega Reacts to Person of Interest Season 1 Episode 2 "Ghosts" Reactions
author: Mega Reacts
comment: It's a very emotional scene when they are reunited. It gets me every time and it doesn't seem to matter how many times I see it, then again I'm such a softie. Thanks for reacting to this.

Ghosts- Thank you so much, Mega! I really enjoyed your reaction for this episode very much. Even with the lagging and the lawnmowing in the background, which I promise wasn't too terrible. As always, this episode for this show is really great, and I am absolutely loving your reactions throughout these first two episode reactions. :)
I love starting this series over with reactors. Season 2 is personal favorite so I'll be back!
In the flashback when Nathan confronts Harold - one of the pictures is John's girlfriend.
@8:15, that's john's wife on the computer where he says "we built it to save everybody"
description:
Welcome to Mega Reacts! 
Support me on Patreon for uncut reactions and the ability to vote in polls to decide what I react to next. https://www.patreon.com/megareacts
